name: Tetris
description: The classic puzzle game where you arrange falling blocks to create complete lines.
fullDescription:
Tetris is one of the most iconic puzzle games of all time. The goal is simple: rotate and arrange falling blocks (tetrominoes) to create complete horizontal lines. When a line is complete, it disappears, and you earn points.

The game gets progressively faster as you level up, testing your reflexes and strategic thinking. How long can you last before the blocks stack up to the top?
author: WebGameMulti Team
controls: Use arrow keys to move (←, →, ↓) and rotate (↑) the pieces. Press Space for hard drop.
